scripts.start:dev: cross-env PORT=4000 RELATIVE_STORAGE_PATH=data-dev ENV=development npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix apps/website && npm install --prefix apps/todo-list && npm install --prefix apps/validation
scripts.build: npm run build:website && npm run build:todo-list && npm run build:validation
scripts.build:website: del-cli "public/website" && npm run --prefix apps/website build && mkdir public/website && cp -a apps/website/build/* public/website && rm -rf apps/website/build
scripts.build:todo-list: del-cli "public/todo-list" && npm run --prefix apps/todo-list build && mkdir public/todo-list && cp -a apps/todo-list/build/* public/todo-list && rm -rf apps/todo-list/build
scripts.build:validation: del-cli "public/validation" && npm run --prefix apps/validation build && mkdir public/validation && cp -a apps/validation/build/* public/validation && rm -rf apps/validation/build
